dc:title: Pilgrimage to Mexico
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Impressions of her pilgrimage to Our Lady of Guadalupe. Gives a brief description of the shrine and describes the places she stopped along the way.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 109 1958-12-26 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
